"He means a lot more than his numbers," Philadelphia coach Eddie Jordan Harvey said. His spirit gives us momentum, his spirit gives us confidence, it gives us a sounding board, it gives us a calming effect. He means a lot. "He's special to us. He's not the Allen Iverson we used to know back in 2001, but he adds leadership, toughness and some experience.
